Class TheGrandPalaceHotel

java.lang.Object
TheGrandPalaceHotel
public class TheGrandPalaceHotel
extends java.lang.Object
The TheGrandPalaceHotel class reads a list of clients, services, costs, and dates from a text file, reprints the data in tabular format, and prints a summary displaying the quantity and total cost of each type of service.
Author:
Kaylyn Phan and Manvika Satish
